saveAndVerifyDownloadedFile(String, Map<Integer, byte[]>) - Static method in class Client
Assembles and saves a downloaded file from blocks, then verifies its MD5 hash with the server.
saveFile(byte[], String) - Method in class FileStorage
Saves a byte array as a file in the configured base directory.
SearchPeer(ExecutorService, Socket) - Static method in class Server
If the thread pool is full, attempts to find a trusted client to handle a DOWNLOAD request.
selectAndDownloadFile() - Static method in class Client
Sends request to server to obtain list of files.
Server - Class in Unnamed Package
The Server class represents the central file server.
Server() - Constructor for class Server
 
ServerConfig - Class in Unnamed Package
Holds server configuration parameters such as port, maximum number of parallel connections (Cs), probability of connection closure (P), frequency of closure attempts (T), and the directory for server files.
ServerConfig() - Constructor for class ServerConfig
 
ServerFile - Record Class in Unnamed Package
Represents metadata for a file served by the server.
ServerFile(String, String, String) - Constructor for record class ServerFile
Creates an instance of a ServerFile record class.
serverHost - Variable in class ClientConfig
Hostname or IP address of the server to request files from.
serverPort - Variable in class ClientConfig
Port of the server to connect to for file requests.
sha256 - Variable in record class ServerFile
The field for the sha256 record component.
sha256() - Method in record class ServerFile
Returns the value of the sha256 record component.
socket - Variable in class RequestHandler
The socket associated with this client connection.
startDisconnectionSimulator(double, double) - Static method in class Server
Starts a scheduled task that simulates disconnections by randomly closing one active socket at each interval with the given probability.
startTrustedClientServer() - Static method in class Client
Starts a trusted client server to assist other clients via token-based downloads.
